title: The Way I Loved You (Taylor's Version)
description:
Did Taylor Swift have a thing for bad boys? Was there an internal struggle that she endured that inspired this song? And how does this song have parallels to a more recent album? Nick, Ana, Amy and Lacey discuss and dissect!
What did we miss? What would you like to add? What would you like to hear? Please let us know!
